title: Secure Connection Failed
content: I am unable to log in to my Yahoo Mail and receive the "secure connection failed" error message. How do I solve this.

title: Trying to watch YouTube playlists but Firefox interrupts and displays a pop-up, stating that playback has been Paused
content: Trying to watch YouTube playlists but Firefox interrupts and displays a pop-up, stating that playback has been Paused. Why does it keep pausing?! I want it to play it on loop and I even tell YouTube to put it on loop. I can't find anything in settings that will allow me to stop Firefox from pausing my playback.
